content.question: In Stadia II, art historians suggest that Julie Mehretu employs pictorial elements such as movement lines and brightly colored geometric shapes to intentionally draw analogies between these elements and the

choices.label: promised fulfillment of future utopian civilizations
multidimensional space and time associated with a fourth dimension
fragmentation of the status quo because of a polarized contemporary society

topic.text: 10.4: Theories and Interpretations of Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
